Title: Lace Appliqued Mother of the Bride Evening Dress

Category: evening, mob

Featured-image: 

----

Description: A lace appliqued top with a sheer neckline and three quarter length sleeves. The neckline and sleeves are adorned with lace applique and bead work. The scalloped edge of the bodice and V-neck shape of the back complete the look. The floor length skirt is slightly pleated.
